summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 11.66 to substitute the railroad company for the conductor or engineer as the person responsible for certain violations; to revise the requirements for a flagger at unprotected crossings; and to change the penalty; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 11.66.020, adding new Sections 11.66.025 and 11.66.230, and repealing Sections 11.66.030 and 11.66.050 in connection therewith.
